title: E5 The “Creepy Little Thing” and a Journey of Self-Destruction
description: In episode 5, Em and Christine have a casual chat about the poltergeist that tortured the Smurl family back in the 80s and everyone’s favorite killer clown, John Wayne Gacy. Christine not only learns what an incubus is (you don’t want to know), but more importantly learns of Em’s deepest, darkest secret (this one you will want to know). Get ready because this one’s a doozy. And that’s why we drink.
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
